action.description: A ref for imperative actions. It currently only supports focusVisible() action.
action.description_zh: 命令式操作的引用。它目前仅支持 focusVisible（） 操作。

centerRipple.description: If true, the ripples are centered. They won't start at the cursor interaction position.
centerRipple.description_zh: 如果为 true，则纹波位于中心。它们不会从光标交互位置开始。

classes.description: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.See CSS classes API below for more details.
classes.description_zh: 覆盖或扩展应用于组件的样式。有关详细信息，请参阅下面的 CSS 类 API。

component.description: The component used for the root node. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.This needs to be able to hold a ref.
component.description_zh: 用于根节点的组件。使用 HTML 元素或组件的字符串。这需要能够保存一个 ref。

disabled.description: If true, the component is disabled.
disabled.description_zh: 如果为 true，则禁用该组件。

disableRipple.description: If true, the ripple effect is disabled.⚠️ Without a ripple there is no styling for :focus-visible by default. Be sure to highlight the element by applying separate styles with the .Mui-focusVisible class.
disableRipple.description_zh: 如果为 true，则禁用涟漪效应。 ⚠️ 如果没有涟漪，则默认情况下没有 ：focus-visible 的样式。请务必通过使用 应用单独的样式来突出显示元素。Mui-focusVisible 类。

disableTouchRipple.description: If true, the touch ripple effect is disabled.
disableTouchRipple.description_zh: 如果为 true，则禁用触摸波纹效果。

focusRipple.description: If true, the base button will have a keyboard focus ripple.
focusRipple.description_zh: 如果为 true，则基本按钮将具有键盘焦点波纹。

focusVisibleClassName.description: This prop can help identify which element has keyboard focus. The class name will be applied when the element gains the focus through keyboard interaction. It's a polyfill for the CSS :focus-visible selector. The rationale for using this feature is explained here. A polyfill can be used to apply a focus-visible class to other components if needed.
focusVisibleClassName.description_zh: 此道具可以帮助识别哪个元素具有键盘焦点。当元素通过键盘交互获得焦点时，将应用类名。它是 CSS ：focus-visible 选择器的 polyfill。此处解释了使用此功能的基本原理。如果需要，可以使用 polyfill 将焦点可见类应用于其他组件。

LinkComponent.description: The component used to render a link when the href prop is provided.
LinkComponent.description_zh: 用于在提供 href prop 时呈现链接的组件。

onFocusVisible.description: Callback fired when the component is focused with a keyboard. We trigger a onFocus callback too.
onFocusVisible.description_zh: 当组件使用键盘聚焦时触发回调。我们还触发了 onFocus 回调。

sx.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles.See the `sx` page for more details.
sx.description_zh: 允许定义系统覆盖以及其他 CSS 样式的系统属性。有关更多详细信息，请参阅“sx”页面。

TouchRippleProps.description: Props applied to the TouchRipple element.
TouchRippleProps.description_zh: 应用于 TouchRipple 元素的道具。

touchRippleRef.description: A ref that points to the TouchRipple element.
touchRippleRef.description_zh: 指向 TouchRipple 元素的引用。
touchRippleRef.type: func| { current?: { pulsate: func, start: func, stop: func } }

events.name: onFocusVisible
events.description: Callback fired when the component is focused with a keyboard. We trigger a  callback too.
events.description_zh: 当组件使用键盘聚焦时触发回调。我们也会触发回调。
